name: Classic Arcade Fishing
description:
2024 newly upgraded classic arcade fishing shooting game, with exquisite graphics and special scenes; unique batteries and wings shake the entire fishing ground, bringing you a different fishing pleasure; more mysterious bosses, innovative events, and upgrade benefits are waiting for you to unlock. This is a casino/shoot them up type of game,take you to experience an unparalleled audio-visual feast!
【The ancient beasts are shocked】
The charming mermaid, the mechanical shark of the future technology, the mysterious and powerful dark dragon, the ancient beast that masters the darkness, the special boss scene interaction and event gameplay, the perfect immersive experience, more mysterious bosses are waiting for you to explore after all!
【Super weapons destroy the world】
The truly innovative experience, the lasers in seconds, the nuclear bombs that bomb everything, the warheads that rampage, the thunder strikes with all their power, etc., will definitely make you feel overwhelmed!
【Random events get rich overnight】
The unique boss awakening event allows you to experience what it means to be lucky! Fun! nice! So exciting!
[Free delivery of super many benefits]
Log in to send massive gold coins, daily tasks, holiday gameplay, and multiple welfare leaders.
【Powerful Fortress Cool Wings】
The exclusive customized turret skin and wing system allows you to stand out and be amazed in the world of fishing!
[Classic arcade super explosion gold]
A mainstream fishing game with classic arcade gameplay, easy fishing, super high explosion rate, and a real hit of 100 million!
